_sText:
News and announcments
- A new version will soon be in progress - New ending will be added - Further optimization - More bugfree The story and conecept: ============= This map is based on Portal, developed by Valve Corporation. You spawn with your fellow cell-mates, and must find a way out of Aperture Sience Research Facility. You will face tons of challenges, and it is your job to stay alive. On your way to freedom, multiple secret spots has been added, search and you will find. Good luck, and please spread the word. Author Notes: ============= Dear Community. Please let me know what you think about this map. Rate it fair, and send me your constructive criticism. I've spend many months on this, so if you add it to your server, please let me know :) **Thank you** Copyrights ========== Porting allowed since the new porting rules. **Refference:** [http://gamebanana.com/wikis?page=porting_whitelist](http://gamebanana.com/wikis?page=porting_whitelist "PORTING RULES")
